abstracts.cdata!:
Purpose of loan is to assist TSK13 in
            financing the foreign exchange costs of investments by
            borrowing enterprises. Also it seems to be especially
            appropriate under Turkey's present circumstances, since
            it would: (a) contribute to using the foreign exchange
            requirements of investments in the private sector, the
            encouragement of which is one of the minus of the
            stabilization program; and (b) help to improve the balance
            of payments through support of export oriented institutions.
